message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. Given its unique value proposition, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. We are confident that this price reflects both the product's intrinsic worth and our commitment to providing exceptional value to our esteemed clients.

Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your description of the product.  While I'm interested, $1,200,000 is a bit higher than I'm able to go right now.  I'd be willing to pay $1,050,000. This would be a fair price for both of us and would allow us to close the deal quickly.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, we would like to extend a revised offer. We believe that a mutually beneficial price for both parties would be $1,100,000. This price reflects the value of the product while allowing for a reasonable profit margin for us. We hope this proposal aligns better with your current budget and looks forward to your positive response.
